50 #ifndef __lib_physics_h
51 #define __lib_physics_h
52 
53 #include <math.h>
54 #include <assert.h>
55 
56 namespace physics
57 {
58  const double PI = 2.0 * acos(0.0);
59  const double FT_PER_METER = 3.280839895; // feet per meter
60  const double PSI_PER_BAR = 14.50377373066; // psi per bar
61  const double PSI_PER_INHG = 0.4911541474703; // psi per inch of mercury
62  const double Pa_PER_Atm = 101325.00; // pascals per atm; 101300.0 is value from FORTRAN code
63  const double Pa_PER_inHg = 3386.00;
64  const double Atm_PER_Bar = 0.986923267; // atmospheres per bar
65  const double KGM3_PER_LBF3 = 16.01846337396; // lbs/ft^3 per kg/m^3
66  const double LB_PER_KG = 2.204622621849; // pounds per kilogram
67  const double KW_PER_HP = 0.7456998715801; // kilowatts per unit of horsepower
68  const double GRAVITY_MS2 = 9.8; // meters per second^2; this varies between 9.78 and 9.82 depending on latitude
69  const double GRAVITY_FTS2 = 32.174; // ft per second^2
70  const double SPECIFIC_HEAT_LIQUID_WATER = 4.183 /*4.1813*/; // J/g*K = joules per gram-degrees K; 4.183 is value currently in Fortran
71  const double WATER_DENSITY = 62.4; // lb/ft^3
72  const double R_GAS_DRY_AIR = 287.058;
73 
74  const double GAS_CONSTANT_SUPER_HEATED_STEAM = 0.461522; // kJ/kg-K
75  const double MIN_TEMP_FOR_SUPER_HEATED = 647.073; // deg K
76  const double MIN_TEMP_FOR_STEAM1 = 623.15; // K
77 
78  inline double areaCircle(const double &radius) { return PI * pow(radius,2.0); }
79 
80  // temperature conversions
81  inline double FarenheitToCelcius(const double &dTempInFarenheit) { return ((5.0/9.0) * (dTempInFarenheit - 32.0)); };
82  inline double CelciusToFarenheit(const double &dTempInCelcius) { return (1.8 * dTempInCelcius) + 32.0; };
83 
84  //inline constexpr double KelvinToCelcius(const double dTempInKelvin) { return (dTempInKelvin-273.15); }
85  //inline constexpr double CelciusToKelvin(const double dTempInCelcius) { return (dTempInCelcius+273.15); }
86 #ifdef _WIN32
87  inline double KelvinToCelcius(const double &dTempInKelvin) { return (dTempInKelvin-273.15); }
88  inline double CelciusToKelvin(const double &dTempInCelcius) { return (dTempInCelcius+273.15); }
89 #else
90  inline constexpr double KelvinToCelcius(const double dTempInKelvin) { return (dTempInKelvin-273.15); }
91  inline constexpr double CelciusToKelvin(const double dTempInCelcius) { return (dTempInCelcius+273.15); }
92 #endif
93  inline double FarenheitToKelvin(const double &dTempInFarenheit) {return (CelciusToKelvin(FarenheitToCelcius(dTempInFarenheit))); };
94  inline double KelvinToFarenheit(const double &dTempInKelvin) {return (CelciusToFarenheit(KelvinToCelcius(dTempInKelvin))); };
95 
96  // pressure conversions
97  inline double AtmToPa(const double &dPressureInAtm) { return dPressureInAtm * Pa_PER_Atm; }
98  inline double PaToAtm(const double &dPressureInPa) { return dPressureInPa / Pa_PER_Atm; }
99 
100  inline double InHgToPa(const double &dPressureInInchesHg) { return dPressureInInchesHg * Pa_PER_inHg; }
101  inline double PaToInHg(const double &dPressureInPa) { return dPressureInPa / Pa_PER_inHg; }
102 
103  inline double mBarToAtm(const double &PressureInmBar) { return PressureInmBar * Atm_PER_Bar/1000; }
104  inline double mBarToPSI(const double &PressureInmBar) { return PressureInmBar * PSI_PER_BAR/1000; }
105  inline double PsiToBar(const double &psi){ return psi / PSI_PER_BAR; }
106 
107  inline double toWattHr(const double &btu) { return (btu/3.413); }
108  inline double PSItoFT(const double &psi) { return psi * 144 / WATER_DENSITY; } // convert PSI to pump 'head' in feet. assumes water density ~ 62.4 lb/ft^3
109 
110  bool EnthalpyFromTempAndPressure(double tempK, double pressureBar, double& enthalpy );
111 
112  const double AIR_DENSITY_SEA_LEVEL = Pa_PER_Atm/(R_GAS_DRY_AIR * CelciusToKelvin(15)); // kg/m^3 at sea level (1 atm) and 15 C
113 };
114 
115 
116 #endif //__lib_physics_h
